text: William Darrell "Billy" Mays, Jr. (July 20, 1958 â€“ June 28, 2009) was an American television direct-response advertisement salesperson most well known for promoting OxiClean, Orange Glo, and other cleaning, home-based, and maintenance products. His distinctive beard and loud sales pitches made him a recognized television presence in the United States and Canada. A universally loved figure wherever he aired he was the only thing that kept most people from turning the channel. Even after his death he is still a popular and prominent pop culture icon. More recently becoming a meme star. He starred in his own TV show called Pitchmen with his friend and co-worker Anthony Sullivan. The show was on for one season before his sudden death. == Death == Mays died at age 50 on June 28, 2009 from complications of heart disease.
